present_address: A-4/337, Vaikunth-2, New VIP Road, Vadodara - 390022

experience_details.responsibilities: Managed pipeline permission projects for clients like Adani Total Gas, GGL, and AGP Pvt. Ltd., ensuring timely approvals from multiple authorities. Coordinated reconnaissance and detailed survey activities, reviewing outputs for accuracy and compliance. Liaised with government authorities and clients to resolve technical or administrative issues, including in-person negotiations. Prepared and drafted technical reports, approval letters, and online applications for permissions (NH, CRZ, Forest, local bodies, private lands).

Led the preparation of property valuation reports for banking clients (SBI, Bandhan Bank, Manappuram, etc.). Verified legal property documents (construction approvals, sale deeds, maps) and identified discrepancies or missing records. Researched market values using internet sources, historical records, and surveyor inputs, negotiated final valuations with bank managers. Personally handled high-value industrial and commercial property valuations, including site visits and in-person negotiations.
